column2: UPDATE 3-Redstones oppose speeding up Viacom CEO's legal case June 3 Attorneys for Sumner Redstone and his daughter asked a court to reject Viacom Inc Chief Executive Philippe Dauman's request to move up the trial over Dauman's removal from the media mogul's trust
